flattenPdf.info: Flattening converts interactive elements (forms, annotations, layers) into static page content. This makes the PDF non-editable but ensures consistent appearance across all viewers.
flattenPdf.flattenFormsDesc: Convert fillable form fields to static text
flattenPdf.flattenAnnotationsDesc: Merge comments, highlights, and stamps into page content
flattenPdf.flattenLayersDesc: Merge all visible layers into a single layer

textColor.searchValuePlaceholder: Enter text to match or line numbers...

formCreator.flattenFormHint: Make form fields non-editable (converts to static content)
formCreator.saveNote: Projects are saved locally in your browser.
formCreator.shortcutsHint: Shortcuts: Ctrl+Z (Undo) | Ctrl+Y (Redo) | Ctrl+D (Duplicate) | Ctrl+A (Select All) | Delete (Remove)
formCreator.clickToAdd: Click on PDF to add field
formCreator.selectToolLabel: Select a field type to add

pdfToDocx.ocrDescription: Use this if your PDF contains scanned images of text. It will make the text editable in Word.

deskewPdf.thresholdDesc: Higher values detect more subtle skew angles. Default: 10
deskewPdf.dpiDesc: Higher DPI provides more accurate detection but takes longer.

pdfBooklet.gridModeDesc: 1x2 is standard for booklets. Use larger grids to save paper.
pdfBooklet.previewDesc: This preview shows how pages will be arranged on each sheet.

rasterizePdf.pageRangeDesc: Leave empty to convert all pages.

markdownToPdf.gfmLabel: Enable GitHub Flavored Markdown (tables, task lists, etc.)
markdownToPdf.syntaxHighlightLabel: Enable syntax highlighting for code blocks

fontToOutline.preserveTextDesc: Keep the original text layer alongside the outlined version
fontToOutline.dpiDesc: Resolution for rasterized elements (higher = better quality, larger file)

hero.title: The PDF Solution for Modern Businesses

features.title: Everything your team needs to work faster
